data.title: Agreements: Online General Terms & Conditions
data.meta_description: Click here to view our agreements for users with and without a Legacy Master Agreement, and to view our EULA & product warranties & more.
data.text:
For customers without an existing master agreement:

The following terms and conditions shall apply to purchases made by customers without an existing Master Sales Agreement or other applicable master agreement in effect as of the date of such purchase between ConvergeOne, Inc. and/or its subsidiaries and affiliates (collectively, “C1”, “ConvergeOne” or “Seller”):

General Terms and Conditions

For customers with a Legacy Master Agreement:

In the event that a customer wishes to purchase products and/or services utilizing the terms and conditions of a master agreement entered into by a predecessor, affiliate and/or subsidiary of ConvergeOne, Inc. (the “Legacy Master Agreement”), the following terms and conditions shall apply to such purchase to the extent applicable:

For customers of:
